评论详情: These are not work jeans, they are dress jeans. These won't be thick and durable, but the look and for are great. They are very comfortable as well.

My husband keeps buying these because jeans he loves the fit. However, they are complete garbage when it comes to durability and wear. The material is thin and the integrity of the denim is poor. They always rip in the back pocket and crotch after minimal wear. It is the true definition of insanity, continuing to buy the same crappy jeans hoping for a different result. Do better Wrangler, or drop your price point to reflect the inferior product you are selling.
I'm 6'6 215lbs. I ordered 34×38 and they are a little long which I prefer over being a little short and otherwise Fit prefect. Seem durable and are comfortable.

I had this same style years ago that lasted forever....not anymore.  I have ordered 3 different colors in this style over the past year and a half and two pair already are ripping at the seams around the back pockets.  I only wear these jeans to work or out in general.  I never wear them to work outside or hunt, etc.  Just bad quality....but then again what isn't these days.
I really like them. Bought for work so they are expensive but the the other wrangler’s all ripped at the back pocket

Jeans showed up with tags removed and stuffed in back pocket.  Jeans are supposed to be 36” length, but only went to mid-shin when I held them up to my leg.  Will be returning immediately.  33” waist is not accurate either.  Supposed to be 33”x36” and are more like 30”x 30”.

I have worn Wranglers for years. These are not the same cut as they used to be. I am a 34x36 and these jeans are baggy on me. My biggest pet peeve is baggy jeans. Not happy at all. I hope they shrink in the washing machine or dryer.

I bought 2 pairs of these jeans a few months shy of 3 years ago and they tore in butt along the seam of the back pocket. Looking at other reviews, this seems to be an on going issue. Jeans used to last me a good 5-10 years. Very disappointing. Do not buy these jeans. Listen to the negative reviews.
they aren't slim fit and cheap material

Started ripping at the back right rivets after 4 or 5 washes. Paid to have it patched. Started ripping down the back left rivets a few washes after that. I don't even use my back pockets. Then the threading started coming out of the bottom hem a few washes later, so I just tossed them into the "donation/future rag" pile. A shame, because wrangler used to be such a strong brand.

评论概述: Odd sizing issues for online purchases.

I ordered a pair of the same size and style I can get at my local retail shop that fit perfectly, but will be so small when I order them online. The last pair were literally 2 sizes too small even with the correct labeling. I can go to my local store and they’ll fit  like they should. It’s weird, I don’t know if it’s because of manufacturing differences from other countries or what? Buyers be aware.
Great product husband loved the fit

Wrangler retro jeans. I love these jeans style and fit. However.In addition to the one pair I ordered here were two others I bought from a brick and mortar store. All of these jeans are ripping apart in the buttocks area above the pockets near the rivets. This is unacceptable but consistent with the poor quality and poor wear of modern jeans. They will last longer if you don't wear them. I wore these regularly and I got one year out of them. PS ; no bubble butt, im a 29 or 30 waist.

I’m wondering these are seconds or something. Both pairs I purchased have ripped in multiple spots. Will never buy these again. 评论概述: Poor Quality - Both Surprising and Disappointing
评论详情: I grew up wearing wranglers and loved the brand, but what they have been producing in the last 2-3 years is not even a shadow of the original product.My "jeans" ripped open at work after maybe 30 individual days of wearing them. I have had this happed with 3 pairs of these new wrangle jeans but this is the first time they ripped open at work and motivated me to post this review. I am an estimator/pm in the construction industry, I am a desk jockey so these jeans are not being exposes to harsh conditions.  Wrangler used to be a great brand, but is absolute garbage now.  It is so embarrassing having to leave work early because your jeans are disintegrating.  I will be finding a new brand to support.
My son will wear nothing but Wrangler. We just keep returning to this link anytime he wants/needs a new pair. Always true to size and great quality.

评论概述: Buen estilo retro y largo ideal
评论详情: Normalmente uso 32 x 30 en cualquier modelo de la marca, otras también y después de llevarme un fiasco cuando compre en esa talla en esta colección  seguí las recomendaciones de Jeremiah y de veras que hay que comprar una talla de largo superior para que quede a la perfección. Voy por los otros modelos y por el buen precio

First - absolutely my most favorite jeans I've ever purchased.  Love the feel, fit, look...awesome.Second - The Greely color jeans are completely different than the Layton color ones I purchased.  I swear they're a totally different jean.  Layton doesn't have the feel, fit or look of the Greely, and it's not just the color.  The Layton's stretch out after one wear and the Greely can go 4-5 uses before I wash.  The material feels different and way more durable than the Greely.  I have no idea what is going on, again, I swear it's a different jean material altogether.  More info: The Greely fit like a slim fit with a bit of stretchy which I absolutely find amazing and can wear multiple times with the same fit and feel. The Layton, stretch after one wear and I don't like to wear them multiple times as they become to baggy for me.  The Layton have become my plane jeans - wear on the plane and toss them aside.Third - The Greely color are my favorite but they will tear in the seams and pockets.  I machine wash on cold and air dry (PITA).  I've used patches to hold them together as long as possible (PITA), but my first pair failed within the year.  I told myself maybe they're defective and purchased another pair in November 2023, already failing on one the pockets, I will patch. again.  For $52, for me I will just buy another pair and hope for another 6-9 months of use.  Not ideal, but I love the jean that much...been trying to find a replacement but everything leads me back to these....darn you Wrangler.I want to try another color but my wife thinks I have issues and will threaten a divorce if I keep buying jeans....it's out of control and it's a problem.I will post some photos when I can soon.
This is my first pair of Wranglers. I’ve been a Levi guy for over 40 years. Very comfortable and they look great with boots.
Great fit, comfortable, great look.

These are cheaply made. The Jean fabric is THIN, and the pants are cheaply sewn together w/weak thread ! The belt-loops "let-go" and fall off because they're only held on by two-stitches !!!! And like I said, the thread is weak, cheap thread. Its definitely not a strong thread ! And the waste fabric has Spandex in it, which is what I wanted. And is a great design. So, the waste flexes & allows for a fat-stomach (Ha ! Ha ! Ha ! ) and therefore a much better & more comfortable fit. But, the problem w/the Spandex is the QUALITY of the Spandex ! It is CHEAP ! After you wear these pants several times, the spandex stretches out & DOES NOT snap-back & return to its original snug-fit ! So BUYER BEWARE !!!
